channel.title: Recent & Upcoming Talks on emiltb

item.title: R Beginner Workshop
item.description: I recently did a short workshop for R Beginners together with Anders Schmidt. Anders wrote a short blogpost about what we covered and the materials we used, which is available here. It was really interesting to use the learnr package, and we will probably try to extend on this for future workshops.
